meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shady or providing shade.
meanings.sent1: The umbrageousnesses of the large tree offered a cool spot to rest.
meanings.sent2: The umbrageousnesses of the umbrella shielded us from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: Seeking relief from the heat, they found solace in the umbrageousnesses of the park's trees.
meanings.sent4: The umbrageousnesses of the forest enveloped them in a comforting embrace.
meanings.sent5: The umbrageousnesses of the awning created a peaceful retreat from the busy street.

meanings.definition: The feeling of offense or resentment.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't hide her umbrageousnesses when he made a rude comment.
meanings.sent2: His umbrageousnesses were evident when his ideas were dismissed without consideration.
meanings.sent3: Despite his umbrageousnesses, they managed to reconcile and move forward.
meanings.sent4: The umbrageousnesses in the room were palpable after the controversial decision was announced.
meanings.sent5: Her umbrageousnesses towards the unfair treatment fueled her determination to seek justice.
